statements: UPDATE user_interaction_data SET interaction_type = 'click' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE user_interaction_data SET interaction_data = '{"action": "hover", "element": "button"}' WHERE user_id = 3;
UPDATE user_interaction_data SET interaction_type = 'click', interaction_data = '{"action": "clicked"}' WHERE user_id = 123 AND interaction_time < '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
UPDATE user_interaction_data SET interaction_data = '{"action": "navigation"}', interaction_type = 'navigate' WHERE user_id = 456 AND interaction_time >= '2022-01-15 12:00:00';
UPDATE user_interactions SET interaction_type = 'comment', interaction_timestamp = '2022-10-15 08:30:00' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE learning_progress SET quiz_attempts = 3, module_completed = 5 WHERE user_id = 456;
UPDATE user_interactions SET interaction_timestamp = NOW(), interaction_type = 'like' WHERE user_id = 12345;
UPDATE learning_progress SET module_completed = 5, quiz_attempts = 3 WHERE user_id = 54321;
UPDATE user_interactions SET interaction_type = 'like' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE user_feedback SET feedback_text = 'Great job!' WHERE feedback_id = '1a2b3c4d-5e6f-7a8b-9c0d-1e2f3a4b5c6d';
UPDATE user_interactions SET interaction_data = '{"key": "value"}', interaction_type = 'click' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE user_feedback SET feedback_text = 'Great job on the new feature!', feedback_timestamp = NOW() WHERE feedback_id = 'a1234567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
